org.madeirahs.editor.net
Class ServerFTP

java.lang.Object
  org.madeirahs.editor.net.ServerFTP

public class ServerFTP
extends Object

Provides static fields and methods for initializing and managing FTP internally. This class handles the obtaining login/username information from the user, as well as creating an FTPProvider available for public use via getProvider().

Author:
Brian Groenke

Nested Class Summary
private static class ServerFTP.ServerLogin
          Internal class that handles the information provided by the user and makes a login attempt.

Method Detail

setFtpServerUrl

public static boolean setFtpServerUrl(String newUrl)
Set the URL the program connects to for access to the FTP server.

Parameters:
newUrl -
Returns:
true if successfully reset, false otherwise (only occurs is string was empty or null).

getFtpServerUrl

public static String getFtpServerUrl()

getProvider

public static FTPProvider getProvider()

promptForName

public static void promptForName()
Shows a dialog for the user to enter his/her desired username for this session. If requested, the information will be saved to the system as a default login.

login

public static void login()
                  throws IOException
Initiates an attempt to login to the remote FTP server. If login information is not available on the system, the user will be asked to provide it. Saved information is encrypted using the Bitshift-0C algorithm. If a FTPProvider already exists with an active connection, it will be disconnected before continuing.

Throws:
IOException

readNameFile

@Deprecated
public static String readNameFile()

readAddress

public static String readAddress()

saveLoginInfo

public static void saveLoginInfo(String usr,
                                 String pass)
                          throws IOException
Saves and encrypts the login information using a RandomAccessFile and byte-shift encryption algorithm.

Parameters:
usr - the username to save
pass - the password to save
Throws:
IOException

readLoginInfo

public static String[] readLoginInfo()
                              throws IOException
Reads and decrypts the login information from the save file.

Returns:
a String array where the username is in index 0 and password in index 1 (usr = array[0], pass = array[1]).
Throws:
IOException

checkArchiveLimit

public static void checkArchiveLimit()

checkDirs

public static void checkDirs()
Checks for all default directories on the server and creates them if not found.
